section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin 'Umar that:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "Prayer at night is two by two, then when you want to finish, pray one rak'h which will make the total number that you prayed odd
